item.title: Hunting Evasive Vulnerabilities: Finding Flaws That Others Miss by James Kettle
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=skbKjO8ahCI This talk really got me thinking about what other vulnerabilities may have been forgotten about over time. One of these days I may have to go trawling through old talks to see if I can find some.
